value.title: Row Filtering in Power BI and Power Query   Remove Blank Rows Vs Remove Empty
value.excerpt: When you have blank values in your data table, you can use Power Query transformations to remove the row with blank values. There are two transformations that are used very often for this purpose: Remove Empty and Remove blank rows. These two transformations are not exactly the same. In this article,
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/1I_KBg6sAF4" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Blank row in DAX
value.excerpt: VALUES and DISTINCT are two functions that differ in how they could add a blank row to the result (or not). Article and download: https://sql.bi/245557?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/?aff=yt

value.title: CALCULATE in DAX #02: Add single column filter
value.excerpt: By default, a column filter in CALCULATE overwrites the existing filter over the same column. How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/?aff=yt CALCULATE function: https://dax.guide/calculate/?aff=yt

value.excerpt: The DATATABLE function can create static tables in a Power BI model specifying column names and data types. value.title: Creating a slicer that filters multiple columns in Power BI
value.excerpt: Do you want to create a single slicer containing the values from different columns? Learn how to create a slicer that applies the selected filters on any of the underlying columns. Article and download: https://sql.bi/323178/?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive

value.title: Debugging DAX measures in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to debug a DAX measure that returns an incorrect result by using different techniques, with and without external tools. Article and download: https://sql.bi/782334?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/?aff=yt

value.title: Different options to model many to many relationships in Power BI and Tabular
value.excerpt: There are two options to model many-to-many relationships using Tabular and Power BI: you can use either a regular bidirectional filter relationship, or a limited unidirectional relationship. In this video, we compare the performance of both options. Article and download: {short_related_link}?aff=yt
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/dEgBOsQGHBA" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Evaluation of variables in DAX
value.excerpt: Variables in DAX are constants, and this could be very confusing! Watch this video to understand how the evaluation of variables works in DAX. How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/ The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/

value.title: Filtering calculation items in a slicer
value.excerpt: Choose between many-to-many relationships and DAX code to filter the most relevant items using another slicer. value.title: Star schema or single table in Power BI
value.excerpt: Is it better to build a model as a regular star schema or as a single table in Power BI? The answer is clear: a star schema is always the best choice. This video analyzes the performance differences of the two approaches. Article and download: https://sql.bi/704257?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt

value.title: Using KEEPFILTERS in DAX
value.excerpt: This video explains how to use KEEPFILTERS to intersect instead of overriding an existing filter context in DAX. Using FEEPFILTERS simplifies the code and improves performance. Article and download: https://sql.bi/751682?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive

value.title: Govern data across an enterprise
value.excerpt: Govern data across an enterprise

topItems.title: Discover trusted data using Microsoft Purview
Manage Power BI assets by using Microsoft Purview
topItems.excerpt: Improve data governance and asset discovery using Power BI and Microsoft Purview integration.

value.title: Implement a Data Streaming Solution with Azure Stream Analytics
value.excerpt: Implement a Data Streaming Solution with Azure Stream Analytics

topItems.title: Visualize real-time data with Azure Stream Analytics and Power BI
topItems.excerpt: By combining the stream processing capabilities of Azure Stream Analytics and the data visualization capabilities of Microsoft Power BI, you can create real-time data dashboards.

value.title: Implement advanced data visualization techniques by using Power BI
value.excerpt: Implement advanced data visualization techniques by using Power BI

topItems.title: Understand advanced data visualization concepts
topItems.excerpt: Create cohesive, inclusive, and efficient Power BI reports to effectively communicate results.

topItems.title: Monitor data in real-time with Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Describe real-time analytics in Power BI using automatic page refresh, real-time dashboards, and auto-refresh in paginated reports.

topItems.title: Create paginated reports
topItems.excerpt: Paginated reports allow report developers to create Power BI artifacts that have tightly controlled rendering requirements. Paginated reports are ideal for creating sales invoices, receipts, purchase orders, and tabular data. This module will teach you how to create reports, add parameters, and work with tables and charts in paginated reports.

value.title: Introduction to data analytics on Azure
value.excerpt: Introduction to data analytics on Azure

topItems.title: Explore Azure data services for modern analytics
topItems.excerpt: Understand analytics solutions in the Azure data ecosystem. Explore the architecture of a scalable analytics solution to meet business needs.

topItems.title: Understand concepts of data analytics
topItems.excerpt: Explore key concepts of data analytics, including types of analytics, data, and storage. Explore the analytics process and tools used to discover insights.

topItems.title: Explore data analytics at scale
topItems.excerpt: Describe data analytics at scale and understand the roles of a data team. Learn about the responsibilities of an enterprise data analyst and what tools are available to build scalable solutions.

value.title: Becoming a solution architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
value.excerpt: Learn how to become a solution architect.

value.title: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure
value.excerpt: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure

value.title: Use DAX in Power BI Desktop to solve business problems
value.excerpt: In this module, you’ll solve three different business problems by optimizing the data model and creating Data Analysis Expressions (DAX) calculations.

value.title: Discover customer needs as a Solution Architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
value.excerpt: Learn how to ask customers questions about their business processes and feature requirements to create a viable solution.

value.title: Discover trusted data using Microsoft Purview
value.excerpt: purview, enterprise data analyst

value.title: Enforce Power BI model security
value.excerpt: Enforce model security in Power BI using row-level security and object-level security.
